title: Home

Forecast dashboards

NA Starts
Canadian housing starts (SAAR) by dwelling type, including:

last 5 years of history
simple random walk with drift forecast
interactive chart for total starts

title: Home
text:
Notes on methodology
Forecasts on this site are intentionally lightweight and transparent. Where applicable, we use simple time-series benchmarks (e.g. random walk variants) to provide context rather than precise prediction.

title: “About”
Owner: TPB Economics Team
This site is a static website built with Quarto and deployed from GitHub. Access control is applied at the hosting layer (Netlify password protection - free for test versions).
